item.title: Compile Nginx on CentOS
item.description: 安装相关依赖 yum install -y perl-ExtUtils-Embed \ readline-devel zlib-devel pam-devel \ libxml2-devel libxslt-devel openldap-devel \ python-devel openssl-devel cmakepcre-develnanowget \ gcc gcc-c++ ncurses-devel perl git ` 编译命令： mkdir ~/nginx_sources ~/nginx cd ~/nginx_sources git clone https://github.com/winshining/nginx-http-flv-module.git curl -O -L http://hg.nginx.org/nginx/archive/stable-1.22.tar.gz # 其他版本 http://hg.nginx.org/nginx/archive/release-1.23.1.zip tar xzvf stable-1.22.tar.gz cd nginx-stable-1.22 ./auto/configure --prefix="$HOME/nginx" --sbin-path="$HOME/nginx" \ --with-select_module \ --with-poll_module \ --with-file-aio \ --with-http_ssl_module \ --with-http_realip_module \ --with-http_sub_module \ --with-http_flv_module \ --add-module="../nginx-http-flv-module" \ --with-http_mp4_module \ --with-http_gzip_static_module \ --with-http_secure_link_module \ --with-http_stub_status_module \ --with-http_perl_module \ --with-ld-opt="-Wl,-E" make make install 注意事项：
